bug.author: NXG2005
bug.summary: [Bug] Fatal error in launcher: Unable to create process using '"d:\bld\spleeter_1574775894867_h_env\python.exe" "C:\Users\(Me)\Anaconda3\Scripts\spleeter.exe" separate -i spleeter/BLEACH.mp3 -p spleeter:4stems -o output'
bug.description: So I have been trying to install spleeter for the past 4 or 5 hours now and i have installed so many other things in order to make sure that is works, and when i copy the commands, it says that it is unable to create process using '"d:\bld\spleeter_1574775894867_h_env\python.exe" "C:\Users(Me)\Anaconda3\Scripts\spleeter.exe" separate -i spleeter/BLEACH.mp3 -p spleeter:4stems -o output' and the same thing happens when I copy and paste the command that is on here. Am I doing something wrong?

comments.comment: NXG2005 try this : python -m spleeter separate -i spleeter/BLEACH.mp3 -p spleeter:4stems -o output it worked for me...

Added an entry in the FAQ section regarding this. It's still not clear to us what is causing this: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/5.-FAQ#launcher-error>https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/5.-FAQ#launcher-error</denchmark-link>
Hi everyone, I'm doing a bit of cleaning and no-one complained about this for a long time (and there are instructions in the FAQ to overcome) so I'm closing this.
